data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter the desired LoadSheet name or title. This will display in the Pay Pal cart next to Payment For.

data.name: plServiceId.Help
data.value: For Subscription based LoadSheets or services, this setting allows you to define a n existing DNN security role to upgrade the user to upon succesful completion of the Pay Pal transaction.

data.name: plOptionName.Help
data.value:
Allows you to define the LoadSheet Option Name to display in the customers PayPal checkout
This displays under the LoadSheet name or title.

For example you might have and option to describe the color of an item, in which case you would set Option Name equal to Color and the customers Pay Pal checkout would display a line item similar to - Color: option desc

data.name: plOptionText.Help
data.value:
Allows you to define a descrption of the LoadSheet option text to be displayed next to the LoadSheet Name in the customers PayPal checkout.
This displays under the LoadSheet name / title next to the LoadSheet Option Name .

For example you might have and option to describe the color of an item, in which case you would set Option Name equal to Color and the customers Pay Pal checkout would display a line item similar to - Color: option desc

data.name: plOption1Name.Help
data.value:
Allows you to define the LoadSheet Option1 Name to display in the customers PayPal checkout
This displays under the LoadSheet name or title.

For example you might have and Option1 to describe the color of an item, in which case you would set Option1 Name equal to Color and the customers Pay Pal checkout would display a line item similar to - Color: Option1 desc

data.name: plOption1Text.Help
data.value:
Allows you to define a descrption of the LoadSheet Option1 text to be displayed next to the LoadSheet Name in the customers PayPal checkout.
This displays under the LoadSheet name / title next to the LoadSheet Option1 Name .

For example you might have and Option1 to describe the color of an item, in which case you would set Option1 Name equal to Color and the customers Pay Pal checkout would display a line item similar to - Color: Option1 desc

data.name: plPrice.Help
data.value: Enter the desired selling Price of the LoadSheet

data.name: plListPrice.Help
data.value: Enter the List Price of the LoadSheet item if desired.

data.name: plShipping.Help
data.value: Enter the Shipping cost associated with this item.

data.name: plMediaSrc.Help
data.value:
Allows you to upload or specify the location of a LoadSheet image file.

This can be set to

  • None
  • URL of an external site page
  • File within your DNN portal.

Optionally, you may also upload a new file by:

  1. Selecting the desired upload folder location
  2. Click on the Upload New File link.
  3. Click on the Browse button and select the desired file
  4. Click on the Upload Selected File link

data.name: plMediaAlign.Help
data.value: Select the desired alignment of the LoadSheet image

data.name: plMediaWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the desired width of the LoadSheet image in the details view

data.name: plMediaHeight.Help
data.value: Enter the desired height of the LoadSheet image in the details view

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value:
Enter a Description of the LoadSheet.
Note: This will display in the online catalog in the listing view as well as the detailed view, but does not transfer to Pay Pal checkout.

data.name: plDetails.Help
data.value:
Enter a Detailed Description of the LoadSheet.
Note: This will display in the online catalog in the detailed view, but does not transfer to Pay Pal checkout.

data.name: plDemoUrl.Help
data.value: Allows you to to provide a link to a demo

data.name: plNavURL.Help
data.value: Enter the More Info link type and source file

data.name: plPublishDate.Help
data.value: Allows for scheduled display of the LoadSheet in the future. For example, a special limted offering or sale period.

data.name: plExpiryDate.Help
data.value: Allows for you to enter an expiration date for the LoadSheet display. For example a sale item or limited offering.

data.name: plViewOrder.Help
data.value:
Enter the desired display View Order.
You can enter a number that will correspond to the item's position in the listing view. Any items that do not have a value defined here will be listed at the top or before all those that do.

data.name: plRoles.Help
data.value: Select the security roles to be notified.
